pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 株式市場は長い不振を続けている。
lessons.english: The stock market is in a prolonged slump.

lessons.japanese: 会社は深刻な営業不振に陥っている。
lessons.english: The company is caught up in a serious business slump.

lessons.japanese: 円高がその会社の経営不振に拍車をかけた。
lessons.english: The yen's appreciation accelerated the decline of that company.

lessons.japanese: 社長は経営の不振の責任をとって辞任した。
lessons.english: The president held himself responsible for the slump in business, and left his post.

lessons.japanese: 自動車産業の不振で多くの人が職を失うだろう。
lessons.english: Many people will lose their jobs due to the slump in the auto industry.

lessons.japanese: 今の経済の不振は深刻な状況にはならないだろう。
lessons.english: The current slump of the economy will not turn into a serious depression.

lessons.japanese: 高い税金と売上不振が同社を破産させた。
lessons.english: High tax and poor sales bankrupted the company.

lessons.japanese: 経済が今不振を抜け出すには時間がかかるだろう。
lessons.english: It will be some time before the economy will move out of the current doldrums.

lessons.japanese: 株式市場は長い不振を続けている。
lessons.english: The stock market is in a prolonged slump.

lessons.japanese: 会社は深刻な営業不振に陥っている。
lessons.english: The company is caught up in a serious business slump.

lessons.japanese: 円高がその会社の経営不振に拍車をかけた。
lessons.english: The yen's appreciation accelerated the decline of that company.

lessons.japanese: 経済が今不振を抜け出すには時間がかかるだろう。
lessons.english: It will be some time before the economy will move out of the current doldrums.

lessons.japanese: 高い税金と売上不振が同社を破産させた。
lessons.english: High tax and poor sales bankrupted the company.

lessons.japanese: 重税とセールス不振のために会社は倒産した。
lessons.english: High tax and poor sales bankrupted the company.

lessons.japanese: 今の経済の不振は深刻な状況にはならないだろう。
lessons.english: The current slump of the economy will not turn into a serious depression.
